description: This file defines an asynchronous FastAPI router for handling Slack events, including verification, message processing, and message sending functionalities, with external dependencies on Slack tools, security verification, and agent/team processing.

methods.name: get_async_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter configured with Slack event handling endpoints.

methods.name: _process_slack_event
methods.description: Processes incoming Slack message events, invoking agent or team responses and sending messages back to Slack.

methods.name: _send_slack_message
methods.description: Sends a message to a Slack channel, handling message length and formatting, including splitting long messages.
